channel.title: Project Destiny - 2007 Remake - REAL 474
channel.description:
[img]http://rune-shiver.com/forum/images/ipb/logo.png[/img]
Project Destiny 474 is a 2007 remake of the revision #474. I have huge plans for this server. You are looking at what will be one of the best RuneScape rewrites that you've ever seen. We plan on making this server a hell of a lot of fun, and if you come and join us you can get an early start on what will be one of the best.
Currently, we have two developers. Myself, and 123sk8. He is in charge of writing scripts (plugins) for the server, doing configuration, and some minor programming. I am programming the more difficult tasks such as minigames, skills, some quests, etc. I can promise that this server will excel in the near future, and the more that join, the better it will become.
Join Project Destiny today, and get a head start!
[SIZE=3][COLOR=DarkOrange]Webclient: [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://rune-shiver.com/webclient.html"]Project Destiny Webclient[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=DarkOrange]Download Client: [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9243681/PD_474.jar"]Project Destiny Client[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=DarkOrange]Website: [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://rune-shiver.com/"]http://rune-shiver.com[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=DarkOrange]Please note you must REGISTER on the forums and log in with those details![/COLOR][/SIZE]
Our advertisement video can be seen here: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0iZRRxYCw4]Project Destiny - 2007 Remake[/url]
Credits to Scu11 for the base I used, google. Credits to Huey & Killamess for the many things his release will help me with.
Please place this in your signature to help us grow! [URL=http://"http://rune-shiver.com"][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v201/YDoUCare/pdsignaturecopy-1.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=6][COLOR=Green][U]Features[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] - [B]Combat[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]PvP[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]PvM[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]MvM[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]X-Logging Properly[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Perfect switching between equipment[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Every weapon special attack[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Equipment requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Degradable equipment[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] - [B]Magic[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Every ancient combat spell[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Every lunar combat spell[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can't mage through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Charge w/ godspells[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Weakening spells[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Bones to Bananas[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Bones to Peaches[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Charging orbs[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Alching/Superheat[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] - [B]Ranged[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Bows/arrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Crossbows (the regular one and karil's)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can't shoot through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] - [B]Prayer[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]All bones bury-able[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] - [B]Mining[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Mining gems at shilo village[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Prospecting[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] - [B]Smithing[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]All bars can be made[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Ring of forging[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] - [B]Fishing[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]All fish can be caught[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Big net fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Fishing Platform[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] - [B]Cooking[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Meats[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Flour collecting[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Bread[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Pies[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Stews[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Pizzas[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Cakes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Wine[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Hot drinks[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Potatoes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Diary[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Brew making[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Cooking gauntlets[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] - [B]Woodcutting[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]All trees cut-able[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct fell chance algorithms[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Birds nest falling out[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] - [B]Firemaking[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]All logs light able[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Firelighters[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Pyre log firemaking[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]mort'ton temple(making sacred oil)[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses)[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]All lighting sources[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Colored fires[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]"Backward" firelighting[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Clipped[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] - [B]Agility[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Run energy affected(weight + level)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Force movement mask[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct animations used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4jFcc.gif[/img] - [B]Herblore[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Herb Cleaning[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]All potions can be made[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Coconut making[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Item grinding(pestle use)[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Poisoning weapons(all types)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] - [B]Thieving[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Doors lockpicking and chests[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct animations and graphics used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] - [B]Crafting[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]Cutting gems[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Making amulets, necklaces, and rings[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Stringing amulets and necklaces[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Crafting normal, hard, and dragon hide[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Crafting snakeskin[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Spinning wool and flax[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Making pottery[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Attaching studs[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] - [B]Runecrafting[/B]
[COLOR=RED]Use of the Abyss[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Rock mining[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Tendrils chopping[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Boil burning[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Eyes distracting[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Gap crossing[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Passage[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Skulled when entering[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Prayer drained to 0[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Dark mage repairing pouches[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]All altars working[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Use of Pouches included[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Talismans "pull" to altars[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Combining runes and their uses[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Mist runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Dust runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Mud runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Smoke runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Steam runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Lava runes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] - [B]Fletching[/B]
[COLOR=GREEN]All logs can be fletched[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can string bows[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can make bolt-tips[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Darts[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Brutal arrows making[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Bow stringing[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Can make arrows[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] - [B]Slayer[/B]
[COLOR=ORANGE]All slayer masters[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Every monsters added for every tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Burthorpe tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Canifis tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Edgeville tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Lost city tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Shilo village tasks[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]'Tips on killing monsters[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Slayer shops[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]All equipment working[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Item that finishes off some monsters[/COLOR] [COLOR=GREEN]Equipment that are required to fight some monsters[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre)[/COLOR] [COLOR=ORANGE]Slayer gem working[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img] - [B]Farming[/B]
[COLOR=RED]Allotments[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All vegetables working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct crop timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Flowers[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All flowers and their effects working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct flower timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Herbs[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All herbs working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct herbs timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Hops[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All hops working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct hops timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Fruit Trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All fruit trees working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct sapling growth timings[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct fruit tree growth timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All trees working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct sapling growth timings[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct tree growth timings[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Gardeners[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Watch over crops working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct payments per type of crop[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Compost Bin[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Supercompost making[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Compost making[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Bushes[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]berries regrowing after being picked[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct bush timings[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]All bushes working[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]Tool Leprechaun[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Store items working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Swaps noted items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]All farming patches working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Correct disease chance algorithm[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Special plants[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Spirit trees teleport to tree gnome[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Calquat trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Belladona trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Cactus trees[/COLOR]
[COLOR=RED]All tools working[/COLOR] [COLOR=RED]Magic secateurs[/COLOR]
Credits to 2006Scape for the skill list.
[B]Quests[/B] [COLOR=Green]Rune Mysteries[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Lost City[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Priest in Peril[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Tree Gnome Village[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Doric's Quest[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Witch's Quest[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Sheep Shearer[/COLOR]
Note that these are full length quests! Everything is just about as perfect as they were on RS.
[B]Misc[/B] High scores, and forum integration Mostly all NPCs in the free world Everything completely clipped. (NPCs, Players, Following) Most shops in the free world. Still adding more XP Rate is 5x Real economy: Skills actually mean something! Money isn't too easy, but it's not too hard either Perfect clan chat 100% Uptime, we're never down! Lots of sounds added, all spells, blocking and attacking for all weapons Regional music system, lots of regions have been added.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1E2ZT[/img]

item.title: Project Destiny - 2007 Remake - REAL 474
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:23, topic:476461”][quote author=kyman13 link=topic=594613.msg4193629#msg4193629 date=1357187670]
Finally remembered my Mopar account stuff… haha anyways all should join this server really fun! - Z
Edit I’m not a first time poster, somehow mine all got deleted, because I have been apart of here since '06…
[/quote]

If that were true, then your “Date Registered:” field would say 2006, regardless of may have been deleted.

Also, thanks for the information drub.

If you abuse this section via posting in any way (ie, you consistently start flame wars, you get other people to continuously bump your topic, etc), you will be banned from posting in this forum.

Now, this puts me in a bit of a situation. From the evidence, it does not seem that Shiver authorized Zach-PD to post the advertising section on his forums, and simply took it upon himself. As such, I will not be banning either of you. However, one of you (Shiver, or Zach-PD) should remove the Moparscape link in the advertising post, as it is in fact against the rules to continuously bump a thread on these forums.[/quote]

c’mon zyle its new year

Read full topic

item.title: Project Destiny - 2007 Remake - REAL 474

Edit I’m not a first time poster, somehow mine all got deleted, because I have been apart of here since '06…[/quote]

If that were true, then your “Date Registered:” field would say 2006, regardless of may have been deleted.

Also, thanks for the information drub.

If you abuse this section via posting in any way (ie, you consistently start flame wars, you [b]get other people to continuously bump your topic[/b], etc), you [b]will be banned[/b] from posting in this forum.

Now, this puts me in a bit of a situation. From the evidence, it does not seem that Shiver authorized Zach-PD to post the advertising section on his forums, and simply took it upon himself. As such, I will not be banning either of you. However, one of you (Shiver, or Zach-PD) should remove the Moparscape link in the advertising post, as it is in fact against the rules to continuously bump a thread on these forums.

item.title: Project Destiny - 2007 Remake - REAL 474
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Zach-PD, post:20, topic:476461”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=594613.msg4194365#msg4194365 date=1357290256]

Finally remembered my Mopar account stuff… haha anyways all should join this server really fun! - Z
Edit I’m not a first time poster, somehow mine all got deleted, because I have been apart of here since '06…

so you’ve had 7 years of mopar gold membership?

Why Are First Time Posters and Junior members bumping this? Although i do like this server.
Goodluck with it.

Are we not allowed too?

iirc you arent supposed to get people from your server to come bump things, or its a lock, I saw it happen in another topic
[/quote]

Pretty sure you aren’t supposed to come and spam threads. I saw this server because of this thread.[/quote]
Are you really that much of an idiot?
The fact that I came on only trying to tell someone/let someone know of the rules and that something on this thread may be breaking them, makes you the person who is posting irrelevant things, and it honestly just sounds like you are trying to get me out of here and make what I said look ridiculous so you can continue bumping this thread. I just thought it was a little weird that a person who made an account 7 years ago miraculously came back at the time of this thread to post in it.
But whoever put YOU in this? Was I speaking directly to you when I said that? No.
But what I just found actually does prove that you are bumping the topic on not just THIS website, but a bunch of others, makes you even more of a douche bag.

7d93a647cbccd1e4ef0599fc7fa38eed.png?13573010521111×578

I can only assume you don’t want people to spam so the thread doesn’t get locked.
What makes me even more mad is the fact that you actually tried ridiculing my post even though it was true, and YOU knew it was true.
4f6fe3b2f910b877761d997f35f27a1d.png?13573011681096×234

Why are you bumping threads in the first place? I’m not 100% sure if its not aloud here, but last I saw, a few topics got warnings for doing that, getting unfair competition over other threads, its no worse than multiple accounts to bump threads, or deleting a post then posting again to bump a thread.

Don’t even try to say you saw this server because of this thread, according to the website you were registered since august 2012, and I’m sure this was posted in late december.
Oh, and you also made the topic telling people to bump the threads less then 3 hours after you posted this…

Read full topic
